Enumeration Type Documentation

enum cvq::error [inherited]
 

errors

Enumeration values:
err_no  no error
err_temp  temporary error
err_dom_inv  invalid domain name
err_user_inv  invalid user name
err_user_nf  user not found
err_auth  error in authorization module
err_udot_tns  dot file - type is not supported
err_open  can't open sth
err_wr  can't write
err_rd  can't read
err_stat  can't stat
err_notdir  not a directory
err_chmod  chmod failed
err_lckd  file's locked
err_ren  can't rename
err_chown  can't change owner
err_over  overflow
err_exec  child crashed or returned something unexpected
err_mkdir  can't create directory
err_exists  entry exists
err_noent  no such element/entry
